00255 
00256 UINT32      GameInitOptionsScreenHandle( void )
00257 {
00258       StartFrameBufferRender();
00259 
00260       if( gfGIOScreenEntry )
00261       {
00262 //          PauseGame();
00263 
00264             EnterGIOScreen();
00265             gfGIOScreenEntry = FALSE;
00266             gfGIOScreenExit = FALSE;
00267             InvalidateRegion( 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00268       }
00269 
00270       GetGIOScreenUserInput();
00271       
00272 
00273       HandleGIOScreen();
00274 
00275       // render buttons marked dirty      
00276       MarkButtonsDirty( );
00277       RenderButtons( ); 
00278 
00279       // render help
00280 //    RenderFastHelp( );
00281 //    RenderButtonsFastHelp( );
00282 
00283 
00284       ExecuteBaseDirtyRectQueue();
00285       EndFrameBufferRender();
00286 
00287       if ( HandleFadeOutCallback( ) )
00288       {
00289             ClearMainMenu();
00290             return( gubGIOExitScreen );
00291       }
00292 
00293       if ( HandleBeginFadeOut( gubGIOExitScreen ) )
00294       {
00295             return( gubGIOExitScreen );
00296       }
00297 
00298       if( gfGIOScreenExit )
00299       {
00300             ExitGIOScreen();
00301       }
00302 
00303       if ( HandleFadeInCallback( ) )
00304       {
00305             // Re-render the scene!
00306             RenderGIOScreen();
00307       }
00308 
00309       if ( HandleBeginFadeIn( gubGIOExitScreen ) )
00310       {
00311       }
00312 
00313       return( gubGIOExitScreen );
00314 }

00323 BOOLEAN           EnterGIOScreen()
00324 {
00325   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00326       UINT16                              cnt;
00327       UINT16                              usPosY;
00328 
00329       if( gfGIOButtonsAllocated )
00330             return( TRUE );
00331 
00332       SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( CURSOR_NORMAL );
00333 
00334       // load the Main trade screen backgroiund image
00335       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00336 
00337       if (iResolution == 0)
00338       {
00339             FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\OptionsScreenBackGround.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00340       }
00341       else if (iResolution == 1)
00342       {
00343             FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\OptionsScreenBackGround_800x600.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00344       }
00345       else if (iResolution == 2)
00346       {
00347             FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\OptionsScreenBackGround_1024x768.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00348       }
00349 
00350       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiGIOMainBackGroundImage ));
00351 
00352       //Ok button
00353       giGIODoneBtnImage = LoadButtonImage("INTERFACE\\PreferencesButtons.sti", -1,0,-1,2,-1 );
00354       guiGIODoneButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( giGIODoneBtnImage, gzGIOScreenText[GIO_OK_TEXT], OPT_BUTTON_FONT, 
00355                                                                                OPT_BUTTON_ON_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00356                                                                                OPT_BUTTON_OFF_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00357                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00358                                                                                GIO_BTN_OK_X, GIO_BTN_OK_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00359                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnGIODoneCallback);
00360 
00361       SpecifyButtonSoundScheme( guiGIODoneButton, BUTTON_SOUND_SCHEME_BIGSWITCH3 );
00362       SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( guiGIODoneButton, DISABLED_STYLE_NONE );
00363 
00364       //Cancel button
00365       giGIOCancelBtnImage = UseLoadedButtonImage( giGIODoneBtnImage, -1,1,-1,3,-1 );
00366       guiGIOCancelButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( giGIOCancelBtnImage, gzGIOScreenText[GIO_CANCEL_TEXT], OPT_BUTTON_FONT, 
00367                                                                                OPT_BUTTON_ON_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00368                                                                                OPT_BUTTON_OFF_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00369                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00370                                                                                GIO_CANCEL_X, GIO_BTN_OK_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00371                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnGIOCancelCallback );
00372       SpecifyButtonSoundScheme( guiGIOCancelButton, BUTTON_SOUND_SCHEME_BIGSWITCH3 );
00373 
00374 
00375       //
00376       //Check box to toggle Difficulty settings
00377       //
00378       usPosY = GIO_DIF_SETTINGS_Y - GIO_OFFSET_TO_TOGGLE_BOX_Y;
00379 
00380       for( cnt=0; cnt<NUM_DIFF_SETTINGS; cnt++)
00381       {
00382             guiDifficultySettingsToggles[ cnt ] = CreateCheckBoxButton( GIO_DIF_SETTINGS_X+GIO_OFFSET_TO_TOGGLE_BOX, usPosY, 
00383                                                                                                             "INTERFACE\\OptionsCheck.sti", MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH+10, 
00384                                                                                                             BtnDifficultyTogglesCallback );
00385             MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiDifficultySettingsToggles[ cnt ], 0, cnt );
00386 
00387             usPosY += GIO_GAP_BN_SETTINGS-5;
00388       }
00389       if( gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel == DIF_LEVEL_EASY )
00390             ButtonList[ guiDifficultySettingsToggles[ GIO_DIFF_EASY ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00391 
00392       else if( gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel == DIF_LEVEL_MEDIUM )
00393             ButtonList[ guiDifficultySettingsToggles[ GIO_DIFF_MED ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00394 
00395       else if( gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel == DIF_LEVEL_HARD )
00396             ButtonList[ guiDifficultySettingsToggles[ GIO_DIFF_HARD ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00397 
00398       else if( gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel == DIF_LEVEL_INSANE )
00399             ButtonList[ guiDifficultySettingsToggles[ GIO_DIFF_INSANE ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00400 
00401       else
00402             ButtonList[ guiDifficultySettingsToggles[ GIO_DIFF_MED ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00403 
00404 
00405       //
00406       //Check box to toggle Game settings ( realistic, sci fi )
00407       //
00408 
00409       usPosY = GIO_GAME_SETTINGS_Y - GIO_OFFSET_TO_TOGGLE_BOX_Y;
00410       for( cnt=0; cnt<NUM_GAME_STYLES; cnt++)
00411       {
00412             guiGameStyleToggles[ cnt ] = CreateCheckBoxButton(    GIO_GAME_SETTINGS_X+GIO_OFFSET_TO_TOGGLE_BOX, usPosY, 
00413                                                                                                             "INTERFACE\\OptionsCheck.sti", MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH+10, 
00414                                                                                                             BtnGameStyleTogglesCallback );
00415             MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiGameStyleToggles[ cnt ], 0, cnt );
00416 
00417             usPosY += GIO_GAP_BN_SETTINGS;
00418       }
00419 
00420       if( gGameOptions.ubGameStyle == STYLE_SCIFI )
00421             ButtonList[ guiGameStyleToggles[ GIO_SCI_FI ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00422       else // if(gGameOptions.ubGameStyle == STYLE_REALISTIC)
00423             ButtonList[ guiGameStyleToggles[ GIO_REALISTIC ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00424 //    else
00425 //          ButtonList[ guiGameStyleToggles[ GIO_PLATINUM ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;          
00426 
00427 
00428       // Madd
00429       usPosY = GIO_BR_SETTING_Y - GIO_OFFSET_TO_TOGGLE_BOX_Y;
00430       for( cnt=0; cnt<NUM_BR_OPTIONS; cnt++)
00431       {
00432             guiBROptionToggles[ cnt ] = CreateCheckBoxButton(     GIO_BR_SETTING_X+GIO_OFFSET_TO_TOGGLE_BOX, usPosY, 
00433                                                                                                             "INTERFACE\\OptionsCheck.sti", MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH+10, 
00434                                                                                                             BtnBROptionTogglesCallback );
00435             MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiBROptionToggles[ cnt ], 0, cnt );
00436 
00437             usPosY += GIO_GAP_BN_SETTINGS-5;
00438       }
00439       switch( gGameOptions.ubBobbyRay )
00440       {
00441             case BR_GOOD:
00442                   ButtonList[ guiBROptionToggles[ GIO_BR_GOOD ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00443                   break;
00444             case BR_GREAT:
00445                   ButtonList[ guiBROptionToggles[ GIO_BR_GREAT ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00446                   break;
00447             case BR_EXCELLENT:
00448                   ButtonList[ guiBROptionToggles[ GIO_BR_EXCELLENT ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00449                   break;
00450             case BR_AWESOME:
00451                   ButtonList[ guiBROptionToggles[ GIO_BR_AWESOME ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00452                   break;
00453       }
00454 
00455       // JA2Gold: iron man buttons
00456       usPosY = GIO_IRON_MAN_SETTING_Y - GIO_OFFSET_TO_TOGGLE_BOX_Y;
00457       for( cnt=0; cnt<NUM_SAVE_OPTIONS; cnt++)
00458       {
00459             guiGameSaveToggles[ cnt ] = CreateCheckBoxButton(     GIO_IRON_MAN_SETTING_X+GIO_OFFSET_TO_TOGGLE_BOX, usPosY, 
00460                                                                                                             "INTERFACE\\OptionsCheck.sti", MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH+10, 
00461                                                                                                             BtnGameSaveTogglesCallback );
00462             MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiGameSaveToggles[ cnt ], 0, cnt );
00463 
00464             usPosY += GIO_GAP_BN_SETTINGS;
00465       }
00466       if( gGameOptions.fIronManMode )
00467             ButtonList[ guiGameSaveToggles[ GIO_IRON_MAN ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00468       else
00469             ButtonList[ guiGameSaveToggles[ GIO_CAN_SAVE ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00470 
00471 
00472 
00473       //
00474       // Check box to toggle Gun options
00475       //
00476 
00477       usPosY = GIO_GUN_SETTINGS_Y - GIO_OFFSET_TO_TOGGLE_BOX_Y;
00478       for( cnt=0; cnt<NUM_GUN_OPTIONS; cnt++)
00479       {
00480             guiGunOptionToggles[ cnt ] = CreateCheckBoxButton(    GIO_GUN_SETTINGS_X+GIO_OFFSET_TO_TOGGLE_BOX, usPosY, 
00481                                                                                                             "INTERFACE\\OptionsCheck.sti", MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH+10, 
00482                                                                                                             BtnGunOptionsTogglesCallback);
00483             MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiGunOptionToggles[ cnt ], 0, cnt );
00484 
00485             usPosY += GIO_GAP_BN_SETTINGS;
00486       }
00487 
00488       if( gGameOptions.fGunNut )
00489             ButtonList[ guiGunOptionToggles[ GIO_GUN_NUT ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00490       else
00491             ButtonList[ guiGunOptionToggles[ GIO_REDUCED_GUNS ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00492 
00493 // JA2 Gold: no more timed turns
00494       //
00495       // Check box to toggle the timed turn option
00496       //
00497 /*
00498       usPosY = GIO_TIMED_TURN_SETTING_Y - GIO_OFFSET_TO_TOGGLE_BOX_Y;

00500       {
00501             guiTimedTurnToggles[ cnt ] = CreateCheckBoxButton(    GIO_TIMED_TURN_SETTING_X+GIO_OFFSET_TO_TOGGLE_BOX, usPosY, 
00502                                                                                                             "INTERFACE\\OptionsCheck.sti", MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH+10, 
00503                                                                                                             BtnTimedTurnsTogglesCallback );

00523 
00524       gfGIOButtonsAllocated = TRUE;
00525 
00526       return( TRUE );
00527 }

00529 
00530 BOOLEAN           ExitGIOScreen()
00531 {
00532       UINT16      cnt;
00533 
00534       if( !gfGIOButtonsAllocated )
00535             return( TRUE );
00536 
00537       //Delete the main options screen background
00538       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiGIOMainBackGroundImage );
00539 
00540       RemoveButton( guiGIOCancelButton );
00541       RemoveButton( guiGIODoneButton );
00542 
00543       UnloadButtonImage( giGIOCancelBtnImage );
00544       UnloadButtonImage( giGIODoneBtnImage );
00545 
00546 
00547       //Check box to toggle Difficulty settings
00548       for( cnt=0; cnt<NUM_DIFF_SETTINGS; cnt++)
00549             RemoveButton( guiDifficultySettingsToggles[ cnt ] );
00550 
00551       //Check box to toggle Game settings ( realistic, sci fi )
00552       for( cnt=0; cnt<NUM_GAME_STYLES; cnt++)
00553             RemoveButton( guiGameStyleToggles[ cnt ] );
00554 
00555       //Check box to toggle Gun options
00556       for( cnt=0; cnt<NUM_GUN_OPTIONS; cnt++)
00557             RemoveButton( guiGunOptionToggles[ cnt ] );
00558 
00559 
00560       // JA2Gold: no more timed turns setting
00561       /*
00562       //remove the timed turns toggle
00563       for( cnt=0; cnt<GIO_NUM_TIMED_TURN_OPTIONS; cnt++ )
00564             RemoveButton( guiTimedTurnToggles[ cnt ] );
00565       */
00566 // Madd
00567       for( cnt=0; cnt<NUM_BR_OPTIONS; cnt++)
00568             RemoveButton( guiBROptionToggles[ cnt ] );
00569 
00570       // JA2Gold: remove iron man buttons
00571       for( cnt=0; cnt<NUM_SAVE_OPTIONS; cnt++)
00572             RemoveButton( guiGameSaveToggles[ cnt ] );
00573 
00574       gfGIOButtonsAllocated = FALSE;
00575 
00576       //If we are starting the game stop playing the music
00577       if( gubGameOptionScreenHandler == GIO_EXIT )
00578             SetMusicMode( MUSIC_NONE );
00579 
00580       gfGIOScreenExit = FALSE;
00581       gfGIOScreenEntry = TRUE;
00582 
00583       return( TRUE );
00584 }
00585 
00586 
00587 void              HandleGIOScreen()
00588 {
00589       if( gubGameOptionScreenHandler != GIO_NOTHING )
00590       {
00591             switch( gubGameOptionScreenHandler )
00592             {
00593                   case GIO_CANCEL:
00594                         gubGIOExitScreen = MAINMENU_SCREEN;
00595                         gfGIOScreenExit   = TRUE;
00596                         break;
00597 
00598                   case GIO_EXIT:
00599                   {
00600                         //if we are already fading out, get out of here
00601                         if( gFadeOutDoneCallback != DoneFadeOutForExitGameInitOptionScreen )
00602                         {
00603                               //Disable the ok button
00604                               DisableButton( guiGIODoneButton );
00605 
00606                               gFadeOutDoneCallback = DoneFadeOutForExitGameInitOptionScreen;
00607 
00608                               FadeOutNextFrame( );
00609                         }
00610                         break;
00611                   }
00612 
00613                   case GIO_IRON_MAN_MODE:
00614                         DisplayMessageToUserAboutGameDifficulty();
00615                         break;
00616             }
00617 
00618             gubGameOptionScreenHandler = GIO_NOTHING;
00619       }
00620 
00621 
00622       if( gfReRenderGIOScreen )
00623       {
00624             RenderGIOScreen();
00625             gfReRenderGIOScreen = FALSE;
00626       }
00627 
00628       RestoreGIOButtonBackGrounds();
00629 }
00630

00743 
00744 
00745 void              GetGIOScreenUserInput()
00746 {
00747       InputAtom Event;
00748 //    POINT  MousePos;
00749 
00750 //    GetCursorPos(&MousePos);
00751 
00752       while( DequeueEvent( &Event ) )
00753       {
00754             if( Event.usEvent == KEY_DOWN )
00755             {
00756                   switch( Event.usParam )
00757                   {
00758 
00759                         case ESC:
00760                               //Exit out of the screen
00761                               gubGameOptionScreenHandler = GIO_CANCEL;
00762                               break;
00763 
00764 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00765                         case 'r':
00766                               gfReRenderGIOScreen=TRUE;
00767                               break;
00768 
00769                         case 'i':
00770                               InvalidateRegion( 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00771                               break;
00772 #endif
00773 
00774                         case ENTER:
00775                               gubGameOptionScreenHandler = GIO_EXIT;
00776                               break;
00777                   }
00778             }
00779       }
00780 }
00781 
00782 
00783 void BtnDifficultyTogglesCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
00784 {
00785       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00786       {
00787             UINT8 ubButton = (UINT8)MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
00788 
00789             if( btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON )
00790             {
00791                   UINT8 cnt;
00792 
00793                   for( cnt=0; cnt<NUM_DIFF_SETTINGS; cnt++)
00794                   {
00795                         ButtonList[ guiDifficultySettingsToggles[ cnt ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00796                   }
00797 
00798                   //enable the current button
00799                   btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00800             }
00801             else
00802             {
00803                   UINT8 cnt;
00804                   BOOLEAN fAnyChecked=FALSE;
00805 
00806                   //if none of the other boxes are checked, do not uncheck this box
00807                   for( cnt=0; cnt<NUM_GUN_OPTIONS; cnt++)
00808                   {
00809 
00810                         if( ButtonList[ guiDifficultySettingsToggles[ cnt ] ]->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON )
00811                         {
00812                               fAnyChecked = TRUE;
00813                         }
00814                   }
00815                   //if none are checked, re check this one
00816                   if( !fAnyChecked )
00817                         btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00818             }
00819       }
00820 }
00821

00948                   {
00949                         ButtonList[ guiGunOptionToggles[ cnt ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00950                   }
00951 
00952                   //enable the current button
00953                   btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00954             }
00955             else
00956             {
00957                   UINT8 cnt;
00958                   BOOLEAN fAnyChecked=FALSE;
00959 
00960                   //if none of the other boxes are checked, do not uncheck this box
00961                   for( cnt=0; cnt<NUM_GUN_OPTIONS; cnt++)

00963                         if( ButtonList[ guiGunOptionToggles[ cnt ] ]->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON )
00964                         {
00965                               fAnyChecked = TRUE;
00966                         }
00967                   }
00968                   //if none are checked, re check this one
00969                   if( !fAnyChecked )
00970                         btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00971             }
00972       }
00973 }

01018 
01019 void BtnGIODoneCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01020 {
01021       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01022       {
01023             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01024             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01025       }
01026       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01027       {
01028             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01029 
01030             //if the user doesnt have IRON MAN mode selected
01031             if( !DisplayMessageToUserAboutIronManMode() )
01032             {
01033                   //Confirm the difficulty setting
01034                   DisplayMessageToUserAboutGameDifficulty();
01035             }
01036 
01037 
01038             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01039       }
01040 } 
01041 
01042 
01043 void BtnGIOCancelCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01044 {
01045       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01046       {
01047             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01048             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01049       }
01050       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01051       {
01052             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01053 
01054             gubGameOptionScreenHandler = GIO_CANCEL;
01055 
01056             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01057       }
01058 }

01061 UINT8 GetCurrentDifficultyButtonSetting()
01062 {
01063       UINT8 cnt;
01064 
01065       for( cnt=0; cnt<NUM_DIFF_SETTINGS; cnt++)
01066       {
01067             if( ButtonList[ guiDifficultySettingsToggles[ cnt ] ]->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON )
01068             {
01069                   return( cnt );
01070             }
01071       }
01072 
01073       return( 0 );
01074 }

01155 
01156 void RestoreGIOButtonBackGrounds()
01157 {
01158       UINT8 cnt;
01159       UINT16 usPosY;
01160 
01161 
01162       usPosY = GIO_DIF_SETTINGS_Y-GIO_OFFSET_TO_TOGGLE_BOX_Y;
01163       //Check box to toggle Difficulty settings
01164       for( cnt=0; cnt<NUM_DIFF_SETTINGS; cnt++)
01165       {
01166             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( GIO_DIF_SETTINGS_X+GIO_OFFSET_TO_TOGGLE_BOX, usPosY, 34, 29 ); 
01167             usPosY += GIO_GAP_BN_SETTINGS-5;
01168       }
01169 
01170       usPosY = GIO_GAME_SETTINGS_Y-GIO_OFFSET_TO_TOGGLE_BOX_Y;
01171       //Check box to toggle Game settings ( realistic, sci fi )
01172       for( cnt=0; cnt<NUM_GAME_STYLES; cnt++)
01173       {
01174             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( GIO_GAME_SETTINGS_X+GIO_OFFSET_TO_TOGGLE_BOX, usPosY, 34, 29 ); 
01175 
01176             usPosY += GIO_GAP_BN_SETTINGS;
01177       }
01178 
01179       usPosY = GIO_GUN_SETTINGS_Y-GIO_OFFSET_TO_TOGGLE_BOX_Y;
01180 
01181       //Check box to toggle Gun options
01182       for( cnt=0; cnt<NUM_GUN_OPTIONS; cnt++)
01183       {
01184             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( GIO_GUN_SETTINGS_X+GIO_OFFSET_TO_TOGGLE_BOX, usPosY, 34, 29 ); 
01185             usPosY += GIO_GAP_BN_SETTINGS;
01186       }
01187 
01188 // JA2Gold: no more timed turns setting
01189       /*
01190       //Check box to toggle timed turns options
01191       usPosY = GIO_TIMED_TURN_SETTING_Y-GIO_OFFSET_TO_TOGGLE_BOX_Y;
01192       for( cnt=0; cnt<GIO_NUM_TIMED_TURN_OPTIONS; cnt++)
01193       {
01194             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( GIO_TIMED_TURN_SETTING_X+GIO_OFFSET_TO_TOGGLE_BOX, usPosY, 34, 29 ); 
01195             usPosY += GIO_GAP_BN_SETTINGS;
01196       }
01197       */
01198 
01199       //Check box to toggle iron man options
01200       usPosY = GIO_IRON_MAN_SETTING_Y-GIO_OFFSET_TO_TOGGLE_BOX_Y;
01201       for( cnt=0; cnt<NUM_SAVE_OPTIONS; cnt++)
01202       {
01203             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( GIO_IRON_MAN_SETTING_X+GIO_OFFSET_TO_TOGGLE_BOX, usPosY, 34, 29 ); 
01204             usPosY += GIO_GAP_BN_SETTINGS;
01205       }
01206 
01207 // Madd
01208 
01209       usPosY = GIO_BR_SETTING_Y-GIO_OFFSET_TO_TOGGLE_BOX_Y;
01210       for( cnt=0; cnt<NUM_BR_OPTIONS; cnt++)
01211       {
01212             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( GIO_BR_SETTING_X+GIO_OFFSET_TO_TOGGLE_BOX, usPosY, 34, 29 ); 
01213             usPosY += GIO_GAP_BN_SETTINGS-5;
01214       }
01215 }

01217 
01218 void DoneFadeOutForExitGameInitOptionScreen( void )
01219 {
01220       // loop through and get the status of all the buttons
01221       // Madd
01222       gGameOptions.fGunNut = GetCurrentGunButtonSetting();
01223       gGameOptions.ubGameStyle = GetCurrentGameStyleButtonSetting();
01224       gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel = GetCurrentDifficultyButtonSetting() + 1; 
01225       // JA2Gold: no more timed turns setting
01226       //gGameOptions.fTurnTimeLimit = GetCurrentTimedTurnsButtonSetting();
01227       // JA2Gold: iron man
01228       gGameOptions.fIronManMode = GetCurrentGameSaveButtonSetting();
01229       
01230       switch ( GetCurrentBROptionButtonSetting() )
01231       {
01232             case GIO_BR_GOOD:
01233                   gGameOptions.ubBobbyRay = BR_GOOD;
01234                   break;
01235             case GIO_BR_GREAT:
01236                   gGameOptions.ubBobbyRay = BR_GREAT;
01237                   break;
01238             case GIO_BR_EXCELLENT:
01239                   gGameOptions.ubBobbyRay = BR_EXCELLENT;
01240                   break;
01241             case GIO_BR_AWESOME:
01242                   gGameOptions.ubBobbyRay = BR_AWESOME;
01243                   break;
01244       }
01245 
01246       //    gubGIOExitScreen = INIT_SCREEN;
01247       gubGIOExitScreen = INTRO_SCREEN;
01248 
01249       //set the fact that we should do the intro videos
01250 //    gbIntroScreenMode = INTRO_BEGINING;
01251 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01252       if( gfKeyState[ ALT ] )
01253       {
01254             if( gfKeyState[ CTRL ] )
01255             {
01256                   gMercProfiles[ MIGUEL ].bMercStatus = MERC_IS_DEAD;
01257                   gMercProfiles[ SKYRIDER ].bMercStatus = MERC_IS_DEAD;
01258             }
01259 
01260             SetIntroType( INTRO_ENDING );
01261       }
01262       else
01263 #endif
01264             SetIntroType( INTRO_BEGINING );
01265 
01266       ExitGIOScreen();
01267 
01268 //    gFadeInDoneCallback = DoneFadeInForExitGameInitOptionScreen;
01269 //    FadeInNextFrame( );
01270       SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( VIDEO_NO_CURSOR );
01271 }
01272 
01273 void DoneFadeInForExitGameInitOptionScreen( void )
01274 {
01275       SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( VIDEO_NO_CURSOR );
01276 }

01278 
01279 BOOLEAN DoGioMessageBox( UINT8 ubStyle, INT16 *zString, UINT32 uiExitScreen, UINT16 usFlags, MSGBOX_CALLBACK ReturnCallback )
01280 {
01281   SGPRect CenteringRect= {0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH-1, SCREEN_HEIGHT-1 };
01282   
01283       // reset exit mode
01284 //    gfExitGioDueToMessageBox = TRUE;
01285 
01286       // do message box and return
01287   giGioMessageBox = DoMessageBox(  ubStyle,  zString,  uiExitScreen, ( UINT16 ) ( usFlags| MSG_BOX_FLAG_USE_CENTERING_RECT ),  ReturnCallback,  &CenteringRect );
01288 
01289       // send back return state
01290       return( ( giGioMessageBox != -1 ) );
01291 }

01294 
01295 void DisplayMessageToUserAboutGameDifficulty()
01296 {
01297       UINT8 ubDiffLevel = GetCurrentDifficultyButtonSetting();
01298 
01299       switch( ubDiffLevel )
01300       {
01301             case 0:
01302                   DoGioMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (INT16 *)zGioDifConfirmText[GIO_CFS_NOVICE], GAME_INIT_OPTIONS_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, ConfirmGioDifSettingMessageBoxCallBack );
01303                   break;
01304             case 1:
01305                   DoGioMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (INT16 *)zGioDifConfirmText[GIO_CFS_EXPERIENCED], GAME_INIT_OPTIONS_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, ConfirmGioDifSettingMessageBoxCallBack );
01306                   break;
01307             case 2:
01308                   DoGioMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (INT16 *)zGioDifConfirmText[GIO_CFS_EXPERT], GAME_INIT_OPTIONS_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, ConfirmGioDifSettingMessageBoxCallBack );
01309                   break;
01310             case 3:
01311                   DoGioMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (INT16 *)zGioDifConfirmText[GIO_CFS_INSANE], GAME_INIT_OPTIONS_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, ConfirmGioDifSettingMessageBoxCallBack );
01312                   break;
01313       }
01314 }
01315 
01316 
01317 void  ConfirmGioDifSettingMessageBoxCallBack( UINT8 bExitValue )
01318 {
01319       if( bExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
01320       {
01321             gubGameOptionScreenHandler = GIO_EXIT;
01322       }
01323 }
01324 
01325 BOOLEAN DisplayMessageToUserAboutIronManMode()
01326 {
01327       // Madd
01328       UINT8 ubIronManMode = GetCurrentGameSaveButtonSetting(); //FALSE; 
01329 
01330       //if the user has selected IRON MAN mode
01331       if( ubIronManMode )
01332       {
01333             DoGioMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (INT16 *)gzIronManModeWarningText[ IMM__IRON_MAN_MODE_WARNING_TEXT ], GAME_INIT_OPTIONS_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, ConfirmGioIronManMessageBoxCallBack );
01334 
01335             return( TRUE );
01336       }
01337 
01338       return( FALSE );
01339 }
01340 
01341 void              ConfirmGioIronManMessageBoxCallBack( UINT8 bExitValue )
01342 {
01343       if( bExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
01344       {
01345             gubGameOptionScreenHandler = GIO_IRON_MAN_MODE;
01346       }
01347       else
01348       {
01349             ButtonList[ guiGameSaveToggles[ GIO_IRON_MAN ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01350             ButtonList[ guiGameSaveToggles[ GIO_CAN_SAVE ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01351       }
01352 }
